wikipedia_page.main: Paul "Wiggy" Wade-Williams is a game designer who has worked primarily on role-playing games.

link_mentions.page: Adaptations of works by Robert E. Howard
response: Pinnacle Entertainment Group released Savage World of Solomon Kane in 2007, written by Paul Wade-Williams and Shane Lacy Hensley.  This game was based on the company's Savage Worlds game system.
| ShlithnethThis entity is introduced as a Great Old One in Call of Cthulhu roleplay game scenario "Cthulhu Britannica: Avalon - The County of Somerset" (2010), by Paul Wade-Williams.
